website_summaries.verdict: An antimicrobial-protected blotter that provides desk protection, along with a clear surface to display photos, cards, and other items underneath.
pros: A thin, smooth surface that's easy to keep clean
Lays flat and doesn't curl at the edges
Color-free and flexible, so items can be positioned easily and read through the vinyl
Nonslip backing keeps pad in place so it doesn’t slide around
cons: A couple of users found the pad thinner than they would have liked

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, thrilled with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Arrived packed in a flat "envelope", and in perfect condition. The clarity of transparency is outstanding, and it lays perfectly flat. I was concerned by the mixed reviews, but must say, I could not be happier and would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a quality desk pad.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: NO non-skid backing; Protector has marks from manufacturer packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these for my older daughter's desk several years ago and it works GREAT! Didn't realize I previously purchased the "matte" version and ordered this "clear" version instead. Very disappointed in what I rec'd. It's just a shiny piece of plastic (no non-skid coating on the backside). The worst part? The edges all the way around the desk protector have markings from the manufacturer packaging. Supposed to be "Krystal Clear". Looks horrible! Thank goodness for Amazon's easy return process.
customer_reviews.author: C. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Slides around and has marks around the edges.
customer_reviews.text: My first one arrived without packaging and was definitely not flat but wavy because the was nothing to hold it flat except some paper stuffing which made it wavy. It also had many scratches like it had been used. I just received my second one and have returned the first. It is packaged correctly, lays flat but definitely slides around. I think I could solve that with some small pieces of double backed tape. However there are marks around the edges probably from the manufacturing process. i would think this would have been found during a quality control check. Ii fits my needs however I am returning because of the marks and hopefully third time is the charm.
customer_reviews.author: TOM DOMVILLE

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This will, I am hoping, keep me from messing up my desk calendar and so far so good. The reason for not giving 5 stars is that my mouse will not work on it, like it did on the paper calendar, so you still need a mouse pad, other wise great for see through and I can just lift it to put notes on my calendar
customer_reviews.author: silverfiesta

customer_reviews.title: Great For Writing, But Not For Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mainly to put on a wood desk. I wanted somthing smooth to write on. It IS nice to write on, by my computer mouse will not function on it (the reason for the star deduction). It's decent quality, but not fabulous. (Second reason for the star deduction). It does the job, but will most likely be looking for a different one sooner than later.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - Hardly "Crystal Clear"
customer_reviews.text: This item just arrived and I am disappointed, it has cloudy lines (see photo) the full length of both edges. I actually have had this same desk pad on my desk for more than 15 years and it has finally gotten discolored and had ink transfer to it, but it's done it's job well. This new one is hardly "crystal clear" as described in the item description.
customer_reviews.author: tbolson1

customer_reviews.title: It's not 19 x 24
customer_reviews.text: I've had Artistic desk pads at work for years - high quality and long lasting. I recently purchased this for home use. The edges are scuffed and scratched, it has an oily feel, and it's 18-1/8 x 23-3/8, not 19 x 24. It'll be returned. Update 1/24/2020 - the item wasn't as the *manufacturer* described, but the seller offered great customer service. No problem with the refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kayse C

customer_reviews.title: Its PERFECT for my desk
customer_reviews.text: Its PERFECT for my desk. I love that I can print out my monthly calendar outlines and keep them in plain view under the plastic. Its also awesome to write on so my table doesn't get indented. It is great quality and came flat so I didn't have any issues with it being rolled up or bent.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Frazer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a good product. Now its not. First one defective. Second one also. Didn't lay flat. Curled at one end. Edges are cloudy, not clear. Edges also have deformities in the plastic. Very dissatisfied with quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Batt

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months and the edges have already curled up and the mat is no longer usable...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Forman

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This was my second order. First one was damaged, this one gas scuff marks around edges and they are not 36” long. They’re 34 3/4”
customer_reviews.author: Phyl

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not as good as before
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. The previously ordered pad was perfect. It lasted about 2 years with normal wear. I bought another one recently and was very disappointed. The pad is thinner and has a warped surface.
customer_reviews.author: RRBD

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have this same product in black and expected it to be the same thickness as the black one and was disappointed in was a lot thinner so ended up putting the black over the top of this one. Not 100% happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Torres Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Destroys fininh on many more surfaces then listed.
customer_reviews.text: The mat is a really nice product crippled by restrictions on it use. It cannot be placed on countertops with any sealant, desks with any finish, most man made materials. The material the mat is made out of slowly bonds to the finish or material and ruins it. The product listed some restrictions on its use. I knew the listed problems when I bought it. The problem is all the other restrictions not listed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The product was fine but the SIZE was 20" x 35"
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but the SIZE was 20" x 35". Come on people, I can understand a small variation in the measurement BUT NOT ONE INCH. I needed specifically a 36" length and the 35" does NOT work. Just to much bother to repack and return...most likely they would send another 35"!
customer_reviews.author: B. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous! Thin as paper.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say other than this mat is ridiculously thin and not worth the box it was shipped in. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: The Princess and the Pea

customer_reviews.title: Warning sticker on product says not to use on wooden desk
customer_reviews.text: The desk pad comes with this warning label "CAUTION: Avoid use on wood with lacquer, acrylic, or urethane finishes as material may mar surface." Ok, I'm grateful that they told me this before I ruined my desk. But I would not have ordered the product if they had said this in the first place on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep notes/pictures visible
customer_reviews.text: This Artistic Clear Antimicrobial Desk Pad Organizer is great for keeping notes/pictures visible on your desk without taking up space. I don't have to post sticky notes everywhere or have framed photos take up precious desk space. Plus, I can write on the desk pad w/out worrying about imprinting on my actual desk top.
customer_reviews.author: M. P. H.

customer_reviews.title: On my desk with all of the lists I refer ...
customer_reviews.text: On my desk with all of the lists I refer to daily displayed underneath. Don't know how I accomplished anything without it!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Melke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to protect my cute white desk without interfering with the aesthetic. This did an amazing job. It's thick enough to protect but clear and does not interfere with the look at all. This is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree G.

customer_reviews.title: It’s Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m have a clear glass desk top and you can’t even tell that it’s on it! IT’S CRYSTAL CLEAR! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chocolatey

customer_reviews.title: Like, but slides
customer_reviews.text: compared to my larger one that I bought that scratches, I like the texture of this one much better. It is a bit thinner and more pliable. It does not scratch, but since it is smaller it does slide easily. I have both on a wood desk.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and size
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It works very well to protect kids’ white desks when they do their homework. The size and quality is as it was described in the Product details. Overall i would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kay

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: It was all wrinkled up and dirty looking . I am hoping it will flatten out on my desk. I would not recommend this to anyone. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crisp view
customer_reviews.text: I got this desk cover because I am averagely accident prone. I have scratch marks and acrylic paint stains on my desk. I was also looking for some way of displaying more photos as my cork board is at capacity. THIS IS PERFECT. Great quality, I can see my photos very clearly through the cover, very smooth. Makes writing much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wireless mouse does not track properly
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on using a wireless mouse on this desk pad... forget about it! It does not track properly. That is why I give this 2 stars. If you are just using it for a pad to protect your desktop, it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and keeps my hand sanded and stained oak desk ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and keeps my hand sanded and stained oak desk in tact. Darnit though, I messed up and put a hot coffee cup on it and have a bubble, yes it's my fault, not the pad. Still very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Joseph

customer_reviews.title: like the product overall but the dimensions are stated falsely
customer_reviews.text: Product is really 18 & 1/4" X 23 & 1/4 not 19 X 24 I really needed 19 X 24 have used them before, like the product overall but the dimensions are stated falsely, fine print say approximate size lol in today's day and age you can cut plastic to size.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY USE.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is actually a desk cover but I use it on the floor under a folding chair for protection against scrapping, marring and gutting my lovely parquet floors.
customer_reviews.author: BookReader

customer_reviews.title: Saving desk
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this much sooner my desk would of been not scratched up
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: We have a decorative material underneath to give it color but the pad is thick enough and nice for writing
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for the desk. We have a decorative material underneath to give it color but the pad is thick enough and nice for writing.
customer_reviews.author: Janet E

customer_reviews.title: There were some comments earlier about the product label being ...
customer_reviews.text: There were some comments earlier about the product label being difficult to remove. The company must have corrected this because my label was a small, static-adhered clear label which I removed in a moment without difficulty. It lays perfectly flat on my desk and is clear and smooth to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife’s makeup table and it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jacques

customer_reviews.title: SO NOT "KRYSTAL" CLEAR!
customer_reviews.text: This product can cloudy and not krystal clear. There were cloudier lines down the sides. Had issue with returning and then they said It was too late to return. No super happy about anything with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, work great on desk, clear, good thickness, were packaged appropriately so they didn't get bent.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice; flexible and crystal clear...really. I am using it on my home desk in my family room that has an all-in-one computer. I wanted a protective cover that did NOT look institutional, but did the job of protecting my furniture. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Desk Pad
customer_reviews.text: It is not clear clear but has a sheen like oil on water. Disappointed in the item.
customer_reviews.author: spider

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good and it arrives flat
customer_reviews.text: This mat arrived and was only 34 1/2 inches long. The quality is good and it arrives flat, but was not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Urey

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: It works well and looks good but this should be a $10 product, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: G. Leon

customer_reviews.title: Description is a Scam!!!
customer_reviews.text: Desk Top blotter says it is .15" thick and its only .05" at most!! Beware this thin blotter is a joke!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wounded Duck

customer_reviews.title: Product Had Cloudy Edges
customer_reviews.text: Perimeter edges of the desk pad were cloudy, not clear. Perhaps it was not warehoused properly or exposed to unfavorable conditions in transit. Returned it and will reorder. Hopefully not a broader product issue. Will report back.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: The mat is OK!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my mat for a couple months and the wavey (not flat) surface is annoying! I thought it would flatten out but no change since first day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to store notes frequently needed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent to use on a desk and put notes under. Also protects the desk area most used.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rob

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 4 of these for our office, very durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Surface Protector!
customer_reviews.text: This clear pad is perfect to protect any desk or worktable. I use it for a desk (instead of a conventional and too small solid pad) and a library table. It can be easily cut to fit any work surface--I cut it to fit my oval library table. And, since it really is clear, it doesn't hide the color or finish of the surface! It can't be used on some furniture surfaces, but that's all in the instructions provided with it. The next one I buy will be to protect a stainless steel garage worktable. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper-XX

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cover for my secretary's desk - heavier than most
customer_reviews.author: Ualapue

customer_reviews.title: Soft plastic not stiff
customer_reviews.text: I expected the product to be a stiff plastic. the plastic is a bit too soft for a desk writing surface, in my opinion. The softness of it reminds me of a thick shower curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Flexible and easily trimmed. Soft enough to be comfortable writing, and firm enough to resist indentation.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Old Bill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our new rolltop desk looks great with this clear protector,,the beautiful wood is not covered up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slides around
customer_reviews.text: I am using this pad to protect the return portion of my desk. It slides around constantly and because it is clear it always looks dirty. Not my fav!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Greene

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing; had a flaw in it. It was easy to send back but went to Staples to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my desk. great place to put my pictures, notes, etc. without worrying about them being damaged
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best desk cover I've ever seen. Very durable. Using it to get some more life for an old table. Mouse slides easily. I believe it is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Beajar

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is crystal clear, does what it is supposed to do - what else do you want?
customer_reviews.author: JaniKin

customer_reviews.title: ... to protect the table from sharpies and also over pretty table matts they are
customer_reviews.text: we use them to protect the table from sharpies and also over pretty table matts they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mark Simon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great mouse pad and my pics are under it to look at all day!
customer_reviews.author: jewel72

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described and easy to clean. Wish it had more "sticking" power to not move around on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on a black desk. We put a printer on top.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Very clear , stays put.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my husband's desk . He can see his calendar and notes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to cover my desk. This creates a smooth surface to write on while still allowing me to see my calendar underneath.
customer_reviews.author: neeter sue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it helps to protect my daughters desk! The chairs are super confortable!
customer_reviews.author: Mirtha Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Desk Top Protection
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my desk to protect the fine wood finish.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Daniello

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Hope it lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I wish this was offered in 48" wide. It covers the main part which is the most important. Good value. Hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Julie V

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my desk top in order to keep it protected.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Marcoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice size. Arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Arrived quickly. Not too "bulky" on the desk but still protects well.
customer_reviews.author: A Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Working excellent. Serves the purpose to the full satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Needed for the Granite Counter Top in a Wine retail shop. Working excellent. Serves the purpose to the full satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The actual size is 23 1/2" by 36" , not 24" by 38"
customer_reviews.author: P. C -

customer_reviews.title: Stated measurements incorrect
customer_reviews.text: The product is clear with no blemishes ( as described by another reviewer). I liked that it came in a flat package. I gave it three stars because the measurements are incorrect!. The package and Internet description on Amazon state that the product is 19' by 24", but it is actually 18 " by 23 ". I am keeping it because it still works, but the stated 24" would have worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Retired&lovingit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is everything that I wanted in a desk pad.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine H

customer_reviews.title: no way
customer_reviews.text: very clear item. returned because it was NOT 24X38 the item i recieved was 22 x 33. very strange size. In heat, this item should NOT shrink. Came up too small for my vanity.
customer_reviews.author: DCfamily08

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the rounded ends and thickness of the pad. Hopefully it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: John Beaudin

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to enable desktop viewing of two documents I use daily. It works perfectly, and provides a smooth writing surface as well.
customer_reviews.author: It's Me

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd gotten bigger one
customer_reviews.text: It's fine although I had to put white paper underneath as it seems to sweat and look dirty in spots (it isn't--just kind of sticks to the wood). I think the larger one would have been better, but it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: B. Weinberger

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! It shipped in a large flat box which I was happy to see. I was worried it would be rolled up and not easy to flatten out.
customer_reviews.author: Bella2three

customer_reviews.title: thank you good
customer_reviews.text: i went to work at a company had cappy desk with this i am able to make desk artwork with calendar pictures i save. thank you good product
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Blann

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Kind of flimsy and with the warning on it, I'm not sure it can be used on my wood desktop.
customer_reviews.author: DLP

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. The only thing that I do not ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. The only thing that I do not like is that it slips all over the desk.
customer_reviews.author: belinda

customer_reviews.title: I love it!,
customer_reviews.text: Great band? Very stylish and comfy to wear. Looks very high end
customer_reviews.author: Linda Todd

customer_reviews.title: product is thin and moves easily on tile floors
customer_reviews.text: Product is clear as described so that you can See the beauty of your floors beneath. However, product is thin and moves easily on tile floors. Edge is beginning to curl where it meets with the deal. Not high quality but easy on the budget. Would not repurchase this pad.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: they are a great idea. i ordered two a week ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: they are a great idea. i ordered two a week ago and i am still waiting for them to flatten out. When delivered they both in bad shape, looked like an accordion. I would say they are not worth $52.
customer_reviews.author: justin bailey

product_meta.title: Artistic Clear Antimicrobial Desk Pad Organizer, 20" x 36" | Non-Skid Desk Pad Protects from Nicks, Scratches and Spills (60-6-0M)
product_meta.description: Size:20-inch x 36-inchThe Krystal View Clear Desk pad offers a clear see through view to the documents, notes, lists and photos organized below. A smooth writing surface is cushioned to give you a pleasant writing experience and keeps your desk free from stains, scratches, nicks and spills. Antimicrobial protection works 24/7 year round to keep your desk pad clean. A non-skid grip keeps the Krystal View™ Clear Desk Pad in place and special formulation prevents copy and toner from lifting of documents. Use this desk mat to organize and protect areas as large or larger than your writing area to provide maximum protection to desktops, tables, counters and reception areas. Not recommended for use on lacquer, acrylic or urethane finishes.
feature_bullets: Clear see through desk pad keeps necessary information in view such as notes, lists, and schedules without diminishing your desktop space
Flexible and easy to lift this smooth writing surface desk mat allows for quick changes to your protected and organized documents and photos below
Cushioned smooth writing surface creates a pleasant writing experience that can help improve penmanship and the non-skid grip keeps the desk pad in place
Plastic desk mat has antimicrobial protection added to keep your desk clean

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars242 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
